translation.en: -[boy] Little bitch! -[laughter]
translation.zh: 小贱人！

translation.en: Give me that bag. Oopsy-daisy.
translation.zh: 把包给我 真是不好意思呢

translation.en: -Knock it off! Get off, Kenny! -What do we got here? I'm gonna take that.
translation.zh: -住手！别骑在我身上 肯尼！-看看钱包里有什么？都归我了

translation.en: -Get off him! -What the fuck?
translation.zh: -从他身上下去！-你干嘛？

translation.en: -You're such a stupid fuck! -What'd you just call me?
translation.zh: -你真是个傻逼！-你刚叫我什么？

translation.en: [girl] I called you a stupid fuck, you stupid fuck.
translation.zh: 我叫你傻逼 你个傻逼

translation.en: Hey, don't touch her!
translation.zh: 嘿 别碰她！

translation.en: Hey, I don't need your help, okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 用不着你帮忙 好吗？

translation.en: That's all you're gonna do? Out here by yourself, teach me a lesson?
translation.zh: 你就这么两下子吗？想单挑？教训教训我？

translation.en: You got held back, didn't you, Kenny? Twice, I think.
translation.zh: 你留过级 对吧 肯尼？我记得是两次

translation.en: You think that's funny?
translation.zh: 你觉得这种事情很好笑？

translation.en: No, I think it's very sad, actually.
translation.zh: 不 其实我觉得摊上这种事蛮倒霉的

translation.en: I only mention it because that would make you over 18.
translation.zh: 我提这个只是为了说明你已经满18岁了

translation.en: If you were to beat me up, which I'm sure you could, it would be child abuse.
translation.zh: 如果你打算揍我 当然你也能揍我可这就算虐待儿童了

translation.en: So if you don't want to wind up on some registry, I suggest you back the fuck--
translation.zh: 所以如果你不想被记录在案我劝你赶紧他妈滚…

translation.en: Do you have any idea how much trouble you're in?
translation.zh: 你知道自己惹了多大的麻烦吗？

translation.en: I'm looking at homework here for at least 15 different students.
translation.zh: 你这里至少有15份不同学生的家庭作业

translation.en: Are we really not gonna discuss that I have an ice pack on my face?
translation.zh: 我们当真不要谈谈我脸上的伤吗？

translation.en: Nurse says you'll be fine.
translation.zh: 护士说你没事

translation.en: So no interest in why a teacher found me sprawled out on the ground?
translation.zh: 所以你毫不关心为什么会有老师发现我瘫在地上吗？

translation.en: Mia Sutton says she saw you walk into a beam out back.
translation.zh: 米娅萨顿说她看到你自己撞到后边的横梁上

translation.en: How do you think we found you?
translation.zh: 你以为我们是怎么找到你的？

translation.en: All right. I get it. I'm in trouble. All I'm trying to say is,
translation.zh: 好吧 我懂你意思 我惹上麻烦了但我只是想跟你说

translation.en: you have the chance to stop the people who make things hard for everybody. You gotta see the big picture here.
translation.zh: 你有机会阻止那些人欺凌弱小你得分得清轻重

translation.en: Light...
translation.zh: 莱特…

translation.en: some people might look at you, a kid in your situation,
translation.zh: 像你这样不幸失去母亲的孩子

translation.en: losing your mom the way you did,
translation.zh: 也许会有人出于恻隐之心

translation.en: and they'd cut you a little slack when it comes to these behavioral issues.
translation.zh: 在你行为不端的时候愿意放你一马

translation.en: Well, I don't believe in that.
translation.zh: 但我不是那种人

translation.en: Detention. Two weeks. Get out of here.
translation.zh: 罚你课后留校 两周 出去吧

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Oh! Hi. I'm awake.
translation.zh: 嘿 我没在睡觉

translation.en: I was just like a tree or a plant or something.
translation.zh: 我不过是像一棵树或什么植物一样 一动没动

translation.en: I'm heading out for a moment. Don't fall asleep or it adds another day.
translation.zh: 我要出去一会儿 别睡着了 不然再多罚你一天

translation.en: "Rule one: The human whose name is written in this note shall die."
translation.zh: “规则一：名字被记在笔记本上的人大限将至”

translation.en: "Rule two: This note will not take effect
translation.zh: “规则二： 写名字的人在写下名字时

translation.en: unless the writer has the person's face in their mind
translation.zh: 如果没有同时想着那个人的脸

translation.en: when writing his or her name."
translation.zh: 本笔记便不会生效”

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Help! Help me! Help! Help!
translation.zh: 救命！救命啊！

translation.en: What the fuck?! [whimpering]
translation.zh: 到底怎么回事？

translation.en: [male voice] Shall we begin?
translation.zh: 我们可以开始了吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Relax, Light.
translation.zh: 放松 莱特

translation.en: You're asleep.
translation.zh: 你不过是睡着了

translation.en: You're asleep and you're dreaming of some eight-foot-tall,
translation.zh: 你刚才睡着了然后梦到了一个两米多高

translation.en: demon-looking motherfucker.
translation.zh: 长相狰狞的王八蛋

translation.en: [creature] Oh, yes.
translation.zh: 哦 是啊

translation.en: A dream. I like that.
translation.zh: 做了个梦 我喜欢你这个说法

translation.en: Dreams are places you can have fun, right?
translation.zh: 你可以在梦中尽情玩乐 对吧？

translation.en: It's all in your mind, so why not enjoy it?
translation.zh: 既然都是你臆想出来的那为何不好好享受呢？

translation.en: Listen.
translation.zh: 你听

translation.en: [girl] Get off of me!
translation.zh: 别碰我！

translation.en: Go, check it out.
translation.zh: 去看看是怎么回事

translation.en: -[girl] No! -[Kenny] Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: -不要！-来嘛！

translation.en: [boy] What?
translation.zh: 你们想干嘛？

translation.en: [girl]Kenny, no! Let me go! Get off me!
translation.zh: 肯尼 不要！别碰我！

translation.en: You're so disgusting! Get the fuck off of me!
translation.zh: 你这人真恶心！他妈的别碰我！

translation.en: -Ooh! While you're down there... -Aw, it sucks to be you.
translation.zh: -瞧你那惨样儿-既然你都躺下了…

translation.en: [creature] Now we could, in this dream of yours,
translation.zh: 现在我们可以在你所谓的梦境里

translation.en: take care of a situation like this.
translation.zh: 料理这样的事情

translation.en: We just put Kenny's name down...
translation.zh: 我们只需把肯尼的名字写下来…

translation.en: and see what happens.
translation.zh: 看看会是什么结果

translation.en: -Nah. -[girl] Get off! You're such assholes!
translation.zh: -不要-滚开！

translation.en: [creature] I know you want to.
translation.zh: 我知道你想写的

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: 写吧

translation.en: Help her.
translation.zh: 帮帮她

translation.en: I don't have a pen.
translation.zh: 我没笔

translation.en: It's a good thing you have a pen.
translation.zh: 还好你有笔

translation.en: Good. Now as long as we're playing, let's do it right.
translation.zh: 很好 既然游戏已经开始那就得遵守规则 （肯尼道而）

translation.en: There's no need to stop at "who."
translation.zh: 不能只是写下名字

translation.en: I'm sorry. What else is there?
translation.zh: 抱歉 那我还要做什么？

translation.en: How.
translation.zh: 还要写下如何死掉

translation.en: For a beginner, not bad at all.
translation.zh: 你这个初学者上手挺快嘛 （断头）

translation.en: Now...
translation.zh: 现在…

translation.en: watch.
translation.zh: 你看好了

translation.en: Give it back!
translation.zh: 还给我！

translation.en: Now listen. I need to separate the wheat from the chaff.
translation.zh: 听着 人类品质良莠不齐我需要去芜存菁

translation.en: I think you might be capable of great things,
translation.zh: 我觉得你是能干成大事的人

translation.en: but if you don't think you can handle it, that's fine.
translation.zh: 但如果你觉得自己不能胜任也无所谓

translation.en: Just put the note somewhere,
translation.zh: 找个地方把笔记本放起来

translation.en: leave it alone for seven days, and I'll find it a new home.
translation.zh: 七日之内不要碰它我就会为它找一个新的归宿

translation.en: How can this be possible?
translation.zh: 这种事怎么可能？

translation.en: It happened. Just like that.
translation.zh: 当然可能 就像刚才那样

translation.en: And if this is possible, imagine what else you could do.
translation.zh: 如果笔记本真的可以杀人想想你还能做些其他什么事

translation.en: -He a friend of yours? -Who?
translation.zh: -他是你朋友吗？-你说谁？

translation.en: Kid in the accident.
translation.zh: 事故里死的那个孩子

translation.en: Oh. No, I don't think he was a friend of anyone.
translation.zh: 不 我觉得没人愿意跟他做朋友

translation.en: Want to talk about it?
translation.zh: 那你想聊聊吗？

translation.en: No. We should talk about why you were still at school.
translation.zh: -不想-那就谈谈为什么当时你还在学校

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that wasn't a big deal.
translation.zh: 那个啊 不是什么大事儿

translation.en: I just wrote a couple papers and then got detention.
translation.zh: 我帮同学写了几份作业结果就被罚留堂了

translation.en: You don't think cheating's a big deal? That who you are?
translation.zh: 你觉得作弊不是大事儿？你就是这种人吗？

translation.en: No, um...
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Actually, I only got caught because I was trying to break up a...
translation.zh: 其实 我之所以被逮到是因为我想要阻止…

translation.en: Know what? Doesn't matter. You wouldn't understand anyway.
translation.zh: 算了 无所谓 反正你不会理解的

translation.en: Because you're just that smart or I'm just that dumb?
translation.zh: 是因为你聪明绝顶还是因为我愚不可及？

translation.en: Because this is what you do. Instead of trying to solve real problems,
translation.zh: 因为你的工作性质使然你不想办法解决实际问题

translation.en: you look over people's shoulders so you can bust them for bullshit,
translation.zh: 却一辈子盯着别人不放 因为一些没意义的事逮捕人家比如说他们没有交报告

translation.en: like not turning in their reports or whatever.
translation.zh: 因为一些没意义的事逮捕人家比如说他们没有交报告

translation.en: A gun is only good as its aim, son.
translation.zh: 枪是用来对付坏人的 儿子

translation.en: I make sure people can trust our aim.
translation.zh: 我要让人相信我们是公正的

translation.en: Just once, it would be nice to think that you actually...
translation.zh: 哪怕就一次 你就不能让我觉得你…

translation.en: I mean, you're a cop. How do you sleep at night
translation.zh: 你是个警察 眼睁睁地看着安东尼史柯莫

translation.en: knowing you watched while a guy like Antony Skomal walked away?
translation.zh: 那种人渣逃脱法网你晚上如何能安睡？

translation.en: You think I just watched?
translation.zh: 你以为我什么都没做？

translation.en: If I was a cop and some guy ran over my wife,
translation.zh: 如果我是个警察有人开车撞了我妻子

translation.en: I'd be pretty pissed off if his dad paid his way out of jail.
translation.zh: 要是他爸花钱替他消去牢狱之灾我一定会气炸的

translation.en: He killed my mom, he nearly beat his girlfriend to death,
translation.zh: 他撞死了我妈还差点儿把自己女朋友打死

translation.en: and you just sit there saying the same bullshit
translation.zh: 你却无动于衷！说着老一套的

translation.en: -about how people better trust your aim-- -I'm gonna assume you're still raw
translation.zh: -让人相信你们公正的屁话-我觉得你还没从…

translation.en: by what you saw today at school,
translation.zh: 学校发生的事情里缓过来

translation.en: and that's keeping you from thinking before you speak.
translation.zh: 所以你说话不经过脑子

translation.en: I suggest you stop talking.
translation.zh: 我建议你立即闭嘴

translation.en: "Rule 64: Each page of the note contains the power of the whole note."
translation.zh: “规则64：本笔记每一页含有同等效力”

translation.en: "Rule 95: Anyone may write names in the note,
translation.zh: “规则95：任何人都可以在笔记本上写下名字

translation.en: but only the keeper can possess it for more than seven days." Jesus!
translation.zh: 但只有保管人可以拥有笔记本七天以上” 老天！

translation.en: How many rules does it take to...
translation.zh: 到底要遵守多少条规则才能…

translation.en: "Don't trust Ryuk.
translation.zh: “不要相信流玉

translation.en: He is not your pet. He is not your friend."
translation.zh: 他不是你的宠物 也不是你的朋友”

translation.en: -[Ryuk] Hey, kid. -Ah!
translation.zh: 嗨 孩子

translation.en: It's pronounced Ree-yook.
translation.zh: 我的名字应该念作流愚

translation.en: Ryuk.
translation.zh: 流愚

translation.en: Oh. Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Sorry for the mispronunciation.
translation.zh: 抱歉把你的名字念错了

translation.en: Ryuk, what exactly can I do with thisDeath Note?
translation.zh: 流愚 这本死亡笔记究竟能做什么？

translation.en: What exactly did you have in mind?
translation.zh: 你有什么想法？

translation.en: Well, it says that I can specify the manner of death.
translation.zh: 笔记本上说我可以指定死法

translation.en: If I can choose how they die, does that mean I can actually control them?
translation.zh: 如果我可以决定他们如何死去是不是也意味着我可以控制他们？

translation.en: Every human spends the last moments of his life in the shadow of a death god.
translation.zh: 凡人生命的最后时刻都是在死神的阴影下度过

translation.en: If we so desire, we can influence those moments.
translation.zh: 如果我们想的话是可以对那些时刻施加影响的

translation.en: There are, of course, limitations.
translation.zh: 当然 影响是有限度的

translation.en: "Rule 20:
A subject can be influenced for no more than two days leading up to his death."
translation.zh: 死者只能在其死亡前两日内受到影响”

translation.en: Two days? Your fingers are huge.
translation.zh: 两天？你的手指好长

translation.en: "Rule 28: Each death must be physically possible,"
translation.zh: “规则28：所有死法必须切实可行”

translation.en: so no shark attacks while someone's on the toilet.
translation.zh: 也就是说 不能有上厕所时被鲨鱼袭击这种死法

translation.en: As much as I love that idea.
translation.zh: 尽管我很喜欢这个创意

translation.en: Uh, where did it come from?
translation.zh: 笔记本是哪儿来的？

translation.en: [sighs] The history of the note is as long as history itself.
translation.zh: 这本笔记跟历史一样久远

translation.en: But who gave it to me? I mean, did you give it to me?
translation.zh: 但它是谁给我的？是你给我的吗？

translation.en: The last keeper of the note passed away. It fell to me to find a new one.
translation.zh: 它的上一个保管人去世了所以我要给它找一个新归宿

translation.en: -What if I didn't want it? -You may pass it on.
translation.zh: -如果我不想要呢？-你可以传给其他人

translation.en: Or better yet, I will.
translation.zh: 这样更好 要是我的话就会这么做

translation.en: -How would you do that? -I told you!
translation.zh: -那要怎么做？-我告诉过你了！

translation.en: When the note is separated from the keeper for seven days,
translation.zh: 如果笔记本与保管人分离七天

translation.en: I find a new one.
translation.zh: 我就能为它寻找新的保管人

translation.en: Who wrote those warnings about you in the margins?
translation.zh: 空白处那些劝人提防你的话是谁写的？

translation.en: Oh, is that what we're gonna do with the note, Light? Rules and warnings?
translation.zh: 笔记的重点是这些吗 莱特？规则和警告？

translation.en: The name and the face is all you have to have.
translation.zh: 你只需知道那个人的长相和名字即可

translation.en: [Light's father] Turner.
translation.zh: 我是特纳

translation.en: Yeah, no, it's fine. What's going on?
translation.zh: 嗯 没关系 怎么了？

translation.en: Say that again.
translation.zh: 你再说一遍

translation.en: You gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: 没跟我开玩笑吧？

translation.en: All right, yeah. I'll see you in a bit.
translation.zh: 好的 知道了 一会儿见

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -[knock on door] -Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: [Light] Hey, uh, one second.
translation.zh: 嘿 稍等

translation.en: Come in.
translation.zh: 进来吧

translation.en: Hey, what you up to?
translation.zh: 你在干嘛？

translation.en: Uh, just fell asleep on my desk.
translation.zh: 我刚趴在桌子上睡着了

translation.en: I just got a call.
translation.zh: 我刚接到一个电话

translation.en: Our friend Antony Skomal is no more.
translation.zh: 我们的“朋友”安东尼史柯莫死了

translation.en: Impaled himself on a steak knife in the middle of a restaurant.
translation.zh: 他在一家餐厅吃饭时被一把牛排餐刀刺进了喉咙

translation.en: -Holy shit. -[chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh: 真惨啊 是啊

translation.en: You seem happy.
translation.zh: 你看起来挺开心的

translation.en: Probably shouldn't be, but yeah, I am.
translation.zh: 也许我不该这样 但我确实很开心

translation.en: Your mom...
translation.zh: 你妈…

translation.en: she always was kind of a hippy.
translation.zh: 她行事作风有点像嬉皮士

translation.en: And we didn't see eye to eye on everything.
translation.zh: 我们有时候意见会有分歧

translation.en: She was damn sure right about one thing.
translation.zh: 但有一件事她说得很对

translation.en: Karma's a bitch.
translation.zh: 恶有恶报

translation.en: Sorry about what I said... you know.
translation.zh: 抱歉我之前跟你说的那些话…你懂的

translation.en: Love you, son.
translation.zh: 我爱你 儿子

translation.en: I love you, too.
translation.zh: 我也爱你

translation.en: [girl] You in mourning?
translation.zh: 你在默哀吗？

translation.en: In... Uh, what?
translation.zh: 默…你说什么？

translation.en: Our friend Kenny.
translation.zh: 我们的朋友肯尼

translation.en: Oh, yeah. It's terrible what happened to Kenny.
translation.zh: 哦 是的 他死得太惨了

translation.en: You don't have to lie to me. Kenny was a sociopath,
translation.zh: 你没必要对我说谎 肯尼就是个变态

translation.en: and just because he's dead does not make it a tragedy.
translation.zh: 不能因为他死了就把他的死归为悲剧

translation.en: -Right. -I just wish I'd seen it.
translation.zh: -是的-真希望我当时在现场

translation.en: I heard his head spun all the way around.
translation.zh: 我听说他的头在地上滚来滚去

translation.en: Actually, his head exploded into a million pieces.
translation.zh: 其实 他的头最后碎成了渣

translation.en: -In case you're wondering. -You saw it?
translation.zh: -如果你想知道的话-你看到了？

translation.en: -I'm Mia. -Oh, hi.
translation.zh: -我叫米娅-你好

translation.en: I know that you're Mia, actually. I already knew that.
translation.zh: 其实我知道你叫米娅 我早就知道了

translation.en: I know that you're Light Turner. I already knew that.
translation.zh: 我知道你叫莱特特纳 这一点我清楚

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: You knew that I'm... You know my name?
translation.zh: 你早就知道我…你知道我的名字？

translation.en: So are you gonna tell me what you saw, Light Turner?
translation.zh: 你会把你看到的都告诉我对吧 莱特特纳？

translation.en: Why did you get me put into detention?
translation.zh: 你为什么要害我被罚留堂？

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I, uh... thought you could use some medical attention
translation.zh: 我…我以为你需要看医生

translation.en: and I wasn't aware of the fact that you were carrying around
translation.zh: 我当时并不知道你背包里面

translation.en: a stockpile of illegal papers in your backpack.
translation.zh: 是一堆代做的作业

translation.en: Is that one of them?
translation.zh: 这本也是吗？

translation.en: Hmm? Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: "Death Note"? What is it?
translation.zh: 《死亡笔记》？这是什么？

translation.en: -What is what? -Your book.
translation.zh: -什么是什么？-你拿着的这本书

translation.en: Uh, I can't tell you.
translation.zh: 我不能告诉你

translation.en: -Okay. -Do you really want to know?
translation.zh: -好吧-你真想知道？

translation.en: -Sure. -Okay, then I'll tell you. I just...
translation.zh: -当然了-好吧 那我告诉你 我就是…

translation.en: Follow me.
translation.zh: 跟我来

translation.en: Please tell me this isn't your poetry journal.
translation.zh: 千万别告诉我那是你写的诗集

translation.en: When you see him, try not to freak out. I freaked out a little.
translation.zh: 你看到他的时候 千万不要惊慌我当时有点儿被吓坏了

translation.en: See... who?
translation.zh: 看到…谁的时候？

translation.en: Behind you.
translation.zh: 就在你身后

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事的

translation.en: What are you talking about? [Ryuk] Only the keeper of the note can see me.
translation.zh: -你在说什么？-只有笔记本的保管人才能看到我

translation.en: "The human whose name is written in this note... shall die."
translation.zh: “名字被记在笔记本上的人…大限将至”

translation.en: -Your poetry sucks. -It's not poetry.
translation.zh: -你的诗烂透了-这不是诗

translation.en: Um, will you just read the last entry?
translation.zh: 你能不能看一下最后一行？

translation.en: "Kenny Doyle decapitation"?
translation.zh: “肯尼道而断头”？

translation.en: I have, and...
translation.zh: 我有…

translation.en: I'm gonna sound crazy, but I have a death god.
translation.zh: 你会觉得我发神经 但死神任我差遣

translation.en: -I'm gonna get out of here. -No. No, don't go. Trust me.
translation.zh: -我要走了-不 别走 相信我

translation.en: You of all people are gonna want to see this.
translation.zh: 你一定要亲眼看看

translation.en: [female reporter] Authorities received a 911 call...
translation.zh: 有关部门接到报警电话… （现场直播：西雅图人质危机）

translation.en: [Light] Okay, we can work with that.
translation.zh: 就拿这件事试试看

translation.en: ...overheard a violent argument between Mr. Brode and his ex-wife earlier today.
translation.zh: …无意中听到布罗德先生和他前妻之间的激烈争吵 （詹姆斯布罗德走出）

translation.en: [male reporter] Things escalated,
translation.zh: （詹姆斯布罗德走出） 随着几声枪响警察推测二人争吵升级

translation.en: as several gunshots were also heard, and the situation is still unfolding.
translation.zh: 随着几声枪响警察推测二人争吵升级 目前事态依然在发展之中

translation.en: Authorities are standing by.
translation.zh: 有关部们处于待命状态西雅图警方…

translation.en: Seattle police and Seattle SWAT trying to de-escalate the situation.
translation.zh: 有关部们处于待命状态西雅图警方… （被撞死） …和西雅图反恐特警队正努力缓解局势

translation.en: [female reporter] This is live coverage of the hostage situation.
translation.zh: 这里是人质危机现场报道

translation.en: -Okay. Watch. -Police are now confirming the hostages
translation.zh: -好的 看好了-警方确认被劫持的人质

translation.en: -are Brode's ex-wife and children. -[Ryuk] Hope you know what you're doing.
translation.zh: -是布罗德的前妻和孩子-希望你知道自己在做什么

translation.en: [male reporter] With his violent history, police are hesitant
translation.zh: （布罗德劫持人质） 考虑到他的暴力史

translation.en: about moving in on this situation.
translation.zh: 警方对于如何应对仍踌躇不决

translation.en: You stupid bitch! You fucking stay there, you snot-nose little douchebag!
translation.zh: 你给我老实待在那里瞧不起人的小混蛋！

translation.en: [male reporter] It appears that James Brode is exiting the storefront.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯布罗德正从商店里走出

translation.en: [female reporter] It looks like he has released her. That's definitely a good sign.
translation.zh: 看起来他放走了前妻这绝对是个好征兆

translation.en: -[gasps] Holy shit. -[male reporter] Oh, my goodness.
translation.zh: -天呐-我的天 （西雅图反恐特警队）

translation.en: [female reporter] Uh, folks, we are trying to get more information.
translation.zh: 观众朋友们我们正在努力获取更多信息

translation.en: I hope no children were watching this.
translation.zh: 希望没有孩子看到这一幕

translation.en: This is obviously very upsetting footage.
translation.zh: （詹姆斯布罗德） （走上车道）

translation.en: In case you're just tuning in, the man holding his family hostage
translation.zh: 这段视频惨不忍睹 （致军礼） 这个人劫持了自己的家人…

translation.en: just saluted to cameras before being run over by a rogue SWAT truck.
translation.zh: （被当场撞死） 在向镜头致军礼的时候被一辆反恐特警车撞死

translation.en: We apologize for these disturbing images...
translation.zh: 抱歉播出这样血腥的镜头…

translation.en: I killed him.
translation.zh: 我杀了他

translation.en: [Light] I guess I should feel guilty, but I don't.
translation.zh: 我猜我应该感到内疚但其实我并不这么觉得

translation.en: [Mia] That woman and her kids are only alive right now because of what you did.
translation.zh: 那个女人和她的孩子正是因为你的帮助才活了下来

translation.en: What is there to feel guilty about?
translation.zh: 有什么可感到内疚的？

translation.en: Thing is, I know what it's like to get fucked over.
translation.zh: 问题是 我知道受到不公正的对待是何感觉

translation.en: Some asshole killed my mom and...
translation.zh: 一个混蛋杀了我妈

translation.en: got away with it until I got this book.
translation.zh: 在我用笔记本杀死他之前他一直逍遥法外

translation.en: I just keep thinking, I mean, why should it just be for me?
translation.zh: 我一直在想是不是也能用它去帮助其他人？

translation.en: I mean, all the people that make life miserable, make life dangerous...
translation.zh: 那些让别人活得痛苦不堪的人那些威胁到别人生命的人

translation.en: I can reach them now.
translation.zh: 我现在可以惩罚他们了

translation.en: Do you think that I'm crazy?
translation.zh: 你是不是觉得我疯了？

translation.en: If anything, I think you're not crazy enough.
translation.zh: 要我说 你疯得还不够

translation.en: -We could change the world. -"We"?
translation.zh: -我们可以改变世界-“我们”？

translation.en: Like "we" as... as in us?
translation.zh: 你是说我们两个？

translation.en: [male reporter] We're getting an update live...
translation.zh: 我们正在进行现场直播…

translation.en: The police are extremely hesitant...
translation.zh: 警方踌躇不决…

translation.en: Can I kiss you?
translation.zh: 我可以吻你吗？

translation.en: You're not supposed to ask.
translation.zh: 你不该问的

translation.en: What am I supposed to do?
translation.zh: 那我该怎么做？

translation.en: [Light] The note was filled with names when I got it.
translation.zh: 我拿到笔记本的时候上面已经写满了名字

translation.en: Whoever had it before us, what did they accomplish?
translation.zh: 那些保管过它的人没做成过什么大事

translation.en: Just small-time killings, revenge, petty crimes?
translation.zh: 只是无关痛痒地杀几个人报复 惩治轻微罪行？

translation.en: I think we can do a lot more than just settle some random scores.
translation.zh: 比起随机撒网 我们能做的还有很多

translation.en: How about this guy?
translation.zh: 这个人如何？

translation.en: I don't want people to say they're scared of it or horrified.
translation.zh: 我不希望人们说他们害怕或恐惧

translation.en: [Mia] What do you want them to say?
translation.zh: 那你想让他们说什么？

translation.en: [Light] I want them to say... "Thank you."
translation.zh: （电刑） 我希望他们说：“谢谢”

translation.en: Look at those people.
translation.zh: 看那些人

translation.en: -[Mia] They're a bunch of sheep. -[Light] No, they're not.
translation.zh: -他们就像一群迷途的羔羊-他们不是

translation.en: They're looking for someone who's not gonna let them down
translation.zh: 他们在寻找一个 不会像警察和政客那样让他们失望的人

translation.en: the way cops do and politicians.
translation.zh: 不会像警察和政客那样让他们失望的人

translation.en: And that's why they have you.
translation.zh: 所以他们需要你

translation.en: [Light] It's bigger than me. It's bigger than us.
translation.zh: 不止是我 也不止是我们

translation.en: What they want...
translation.zh: 他们期盼的…

translation.en: is a god.
translation.zh: 是一位神

translation.en: So let's give it to them.
translation.zh: 我们就让他们得偿所愿

translation.en: Let's give them a god, let's make a name for him.
translation.zh: 我们就为他们制造一个神我们给他起个名字

translation.en: A god that never lets anybody down.
translation.zh: 一个永远不会让任何人失望的神

translation.en: It's not gonna solve a few crimes, it's gonna solve all crime.
translation.zh: 它能解决的不是一部分罪恶而是全部罪恶

translation.en: [Mia] A god that scares the shit out of the bad guys
translation.zh: 一个把坏人吓得惶惶不可终日

translation.en: until they don't want to be bad anymore?
translation.zh: 直到他们不敢再作恶的神？

translation.en: [Light] A god who inspires hope that things can actually change.
translation.zh: 一个能够唤起人们内心的希望让他们知道世风真的可以改变的神

translation.en: Kira.
translation.zh: 基拉

translation.en: Kira? What does that mean?
translation.zh: 基拉？什么意思？

translation.en: It means "light" in Russian and Celtic.
translation.zh: 在俄语和凯尔特语里都是“月”的意思

translation.en: Wouldn't you be worried they could trace it back to you?
translation.zh: 你不担心别人会通过这个词找到你？

translation.en: No. How could they?
translation.zh: 不担心 怎么找？

translation.en: It also sort of means "killer" in Japanese,
translation.zh: 它在日语里还是“杀手”的意思

translation.en: so if they're looking, it's gonna be on the wrong continent.
translation.zh: 所以就算他们查 肯定也找不对方向

translation.en: [female reporter] Who or what is Kira?
translation.zh: 基拉是什么人或什么东西？

translation.en: That's the question facing baffled investigators today
translation.zh: 世界六大洲各地均出现死刑犯命丧牢房

translation.en: as death row inmates in six different continents were found dead in their cells.
translation.zh: 这个问题令调查员们困惑不已

translation.en: Each victim left behind the same message written in perfect Japanese.
translation.zh: 这个问题令调查员们困惑不已 每个死亡现场都有用流利的日文写下的相同留言

translation.en: [Mia] I think I got one.
translation.zh: （阿卜杜勒阿斯瓦德） 我找到目标了

translation.en: [reporter in German] Reports are that the previously elusive leader
translation.zh: 报道称恐怖组织… （吃下一颗手榴弹）

translation.en: of the terrorist movement blew himself up in front of his men.
translation.zh: …这位行踪诡秘的前首领 当着手下的面把自己引爆

translation.en: Kira is apparently behind the bizarre deaths.
translation.zh: 显然 基拉是这一系列离奇死亡事件的幕后主使

translation.en: [reporter in Spanish] Five members of the cartel apparently threw themselves
translation.zh: 五名贩毒集团成员

translation.en: in front of an oncoming train.
translation.zh: 冲向疾驰而来的火车

translation.en: Kira is responsible for all of these acts
translation.zh: 基拉对这些

translation.en: that are happening right now.
translation.zh: 正在发生的事件负责

translation.en: [man in English] The globalists will have you believe
translation.zh: 全球主义者宣称基拉是新世界的救世主

translation.en: that Kira's the New World Messiah here to right the wrongs of our time.
translation.zh: 全球主义者宣称基拉是新世界的救世主 前来除恶扬善、拨乱反正

translation.en: This is another bid by the super elites to sweep the rug from under us
translation.zh: 这是超级精英们又一次为了掩人耳目…

translation.en: and shape our reality by what can only be described
translation.zh: （基拉拯救世界） …操控现实而进行的尝试此举可以称得上是

translation.en: as one of the greatest false flag operations in the history of covert ops.
translation.zh: …操控现实而进行的尝试此举可以称得上是 秘密行动史上最大的伪旗行动之一

translation.en: [female reporter] Fear they will be punished by Kira
translation.zh: 由于担心受到基拉的惩罚 （基拉成为联邦调查局头号逃犯）

translation.en: has led to a series of wanted criminals literally turning themselves in.
translation.zh: （基拉成为联邦调查局头号逃犯） 许多通缉犯纷纷自首 （上帝是否存在？赞美基拉！） （白宫准备对付基拉）

translation.en: Kira's had a bigger impact on crime than anything I've seen.
translation.zh: 基拉对罪犯的影响是前所未有的

translation.en: I don't wanna say our job's gotten easier, but look around you.
translation.zh: 我得说他减轻了我们不少工作负担现在人们身边的罪犯少了

translation.en: [female reporter] News out of Japan tonight where Kira has apparently struck again.
translation.zh: 根据今晚来自日本的新闻报道基拉显然再次出手了

translation.en: More than a dozen were found dead in a Tokyo nightclub,
translation.zh: 多人被发现死于东京一家夜店

translation.en: a scene authorities described as "incredibly gruesome."
translation.zh: 相关部门用“惨不忍睹”形容现场场景

translation.en: What can anyone tell us about Kira?
translation.zh: 基拉到底是谁？

translation.en: And perhaps, more importantly, can anyone stop it?
translation.zh: 也许更重要的问题是有谁能阻止他？

translation.en: And should they?
translation.zh: 他应该被阻止吗？

translation.en: [in Japanese] It makes no sense.
translation.zh: 说不通啊

translation.en: The Nakamuras and the Inagawas have had a truce for over ten years.
translation.zh: 中村派和稲川派已经停战十多年了

translation.en: How would Kira even know about them?
translation.zh: 基拉怎么会知道他们？

translation.en: -[L] Because I tipped him off. -What?
translation.zh: -是我透露给他的-什么？

translation.en: I've had access to law enforcement databases for some time.
translation.zh: 我这段时间可以进入执法部门的数据库

translation.en: I've been seeding the names of obscure criminals,
translation.zh: 我一直在往数据库里添加隐秘罪犯的姓名

translation.en: waiting for a hit.
translation.zh: 等着基拉出手

translation.en: And now... we know who we're looking for.
translation.zh: 如今 我们知道要找的人是谁了

translation.en: [man in English] How long since you've slept?
translation.zh: 你多久没睡觉了？

translation.en: Forty-one hours.
translation.zh: 41个小时

translation.en: And you're certain of your conclusions?
translation.zh: 你确信自己的结论没有问题？

translation.en: Yes. [hums softly]
translation.zh: 确信

translation.en: The insulin spike from the candies will focus your mind for final consideration.
translation.zh: 那些糖果会让你体内胰岛素激增促使你集中精力思考问题

translation.en: When it fades, you will sleep for one hour.
translation.zh: 药效消散后 你会睡上一个小时

translation.en: Wear these to properly prepare your body clock.
translation.zh: 把这副眼镜戴上它能帮你适应生物钟

translation.en: I've been contemplating several different strategies.
translation.zh: 我一直在思考几个不同的策略

translation.en: I honestly don't know that I'll be able to sleep.
translation.zh: 说实话 我都不知道自己能不能睡着

translation.en: -Sleep is key to strong thought. -Yes.
translation.zh: -睡眠是有效思维的保证-没错

translation.en: Would you mind singing a song for me?
translation.zh: 能为我唱首歌吗？

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然可以

translation.en: ♪ You're out of the woods You're out of the dark ♪
translation.zh: 你走出森林 走出黑暗

translation.en: ♪ You're out of the night ♪
translation.zh: 走出黑夜

translation.en: ♪ Step into the sun, step into the light ♪
translation.zh: 踏入阳光下 踏入光明中

translation.en: ♪ Keep straight ahead For the most glorious place ♪
translation.zh: 继续前行 直至光辉之地

translation.en: [voice fades, echoing] ♪ On the face of the Earth and the sky ♪
translation.zh: 地面之上 天空之中

translation.en: ♪ Hold onto your breath Hold onto your heart ♪
translation.zh: 屏气凝神 不忘初心

translation.en: ♪ Hold onto your hope ♪
translation.zh: 心怀希望

translation.en: ♪ Walk up to the gate and let it open ♪
translation.zh: 走向那扇大门 打开它

translation.en: Investigation, since when? And why are you just telling me this now?
translation.zh: 调查？什么时候开始的？你怎么现在才跟我说？

translation.en: Because I just got added last week.
translation.zh: 因为我上周刚加入调查组

translation.en: Knowing you'd have this sort of calm and thoughtful response,
translation.zh: 要是早知道你的反应如此淡定谨慎

translation.en: I can't imagine why I didn't bring it up sooner.
translation.zh: 我就不会等到现在才告诉你

translation.en: What part of terrorists killing each other
translation.zh: 恐怖分子自相残杀

translation.en: and criminals turning themselves in bothers you, Dad?
translation.zh: 罪犯自首 这有什么不好的 爸？

translation.en: Why exactly are they doing that, son?
translation.zh: 可是他们为什么要这么做？

translation.en: -They're doing it because of Kira. -Right, and who is that?
translation.zh: -他们这么做是因为基拉-没错 可基拉是谁？

translation.en: How does Kira get to decide who lives and dies, who's guilty and innocent?
translation.zh: 凭什么让基拉来决定谁生谁死谁有罪谁没罪？

translation.en: Is there a complaints department if I don't like one of Kira's decisions?
translation.zh: 如果我不喜欢基拉的决定能不能找投诉部门发发牢骚？

translation.en: Or would complaining get me put on Kira's list?
translation.zh: 基拉会因为我发牢骚除掉我吗？

translation.en: Is that what everybody at the station thinks?
translation.zh: 局里所有人都是这么想的吗？

translation.en: Well, it's safe to say I'm ahead of the curve on that one.
translation.zh: 在这个问题上 我的观点比较超前

translation.en: Hey, how do I look?
translation.zh: 嘿 我这身行头怎么样？

translation.en: -Good. -All right. See you this afternoon.
translation.zh: -不错-好的 下午见

translation.en: -Turner. -[man] Just got a call from the FBI.
translation.zh: -我是特纳-联邦调查局刚打电话来了

translation.en: Apparently, they got someone who wants to speak with you.
translation.zh: 他们说有人想跟你聊聊

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? And who is that? -They're not really saying.
translation.zh: -是吗？谁啊？-他们不肯说

translation.en: Just said he helped them out before
translation.zh: 只是说那人之前帮过他们

translation.en: and he's got a theory on the Kira situation.
translation.zh: 而且关于基拉的案子 他有一些想法

translation.en: -I just got the case. What does he want? -I have no idea.
translation.zh: -这案子我刚接手 他想干嘛？-我不知道

translation.en: They said he's a little different.
translation.zh: 他们说这人有些怪异

translation.en: In fact, they'll probably send a representative...
translation.zh: 实际上 他们可能会派个代表…

translation.en: [man] Detective Turner?
translation.zh: 特纳警官？

translation.en: I am to meet with Detective Turner,
translation.zh: 我是来找特纳警官的

translation.en: local head of the Kira investigation, in his office at 9:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 本地基拉调查案的组长我约好九点在他办公室见面

translation.en: Call you back.
translation.zh: 我回头打给你

translation.en: -What can I do for you? -I am Watari.
translation.zh: -您有何贵干？-我是亘理

translation.en: Your fellow officers did that?
translation.zh: 是你的同事写的？

translation.en: Cops don't like it when you go after other cops,
translation.zh: 警界不喜欢自己人追捕自己人

translation.en: but, apparently, they hate it when you go after their god.
translation.zh: 显然 他们也不喜欢有人追捕他们心中的神

translation.en: They support Kira?
translation.zh: 他们支持基拉吗？

translation.en: Kira's doing away with the "Most Wanted" list.
translation.zh: 基拉帮他们解决棘手的通缉犯问题

translation.en: These guys wanna throw him a parade.
translation.zh: 这些人恨不得为他上街游行

translation.en: But now that rumor has it Kira's a cop, it's in my world.
translation.zh: 但现在有传言称基拉是个警察就在我的部门里

translation.en: The idea that Kira is associated with law enforcement is not a rumor.
translation.zh: 基拉与执法部门有关不是传言

translation.en: It is a fact,
translation.zh: 而是事实

translation.en: uncovered by the individual I work with.
translation.zh: 是跟我一起共事的人发现的

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, and who's that? -He goes by the letter "L."
translation.zh: -是吗 那这人是谁？-他的名字是L

translation.en: L is real?
translation.zh: 真的有L这个人？

translation.en: You're familiar?
translation.zh: 你知道他？

translation.en: Yeah, I hear things.
translation.zh: 嗯 有所耳闻

translation.en: That giant smuggling ring in Eastern Europe,
translation.zh: 东欧那个庞大的走私集团

translation.en: practically handed to police on a platter.
translation.zh: 简直就是L端给警方的大餐

translation.en: L would like to speak with you regarding the Kira investigation.
translation.zh: L想跟你谈谈针对基拉的调查

translation.en: -Okay. When? -Right now.
translation.zh: -好的 什么时候？-现在

translation.en: -[L] Hmm, Detective Turner. -What is this?
translation.zh: -特纳警官-这是怎么回事？

translation.en: A one-time offer.
translation.zh: 我有个提议 仅限这次

translation.en: I'd like to assist you in the capture of Kira.
translation.zh: 我愿意帮你抓到基拉

translation.en: Why me? The FBI, CIA have hundreds of men on this.
translation.zh: 为什么选我？联邦调查局和中情局有上千人在调查此事

translation.en: I've been in communication with Interpol and the FBI,
translation.zh: 我一直在跟国际刑警组织和联邦调查局沟通

translation.en: but I believe you have something they do not.
translation.zh: 但我认为你具有他们所不具备的优势

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 什么优势？

translation.en: An in-depth understanding of potential suspects.
translation.zh: 你非常了解本案嫌疑人

translation.en: Why would I have a better understanding?
translation.zh: 此话怎讲？

translation.en: The FBI thinks the killer is operating out of Japan.
translation.zh: 联邦调查局认为凶手是在日本遥控作案

translation.en: Because of the name Kira.
translation.zh: 因为“基拉”这个名字

translation.en: Ah, but the name is an intentional misdirection.
translation.zh: 没错 但这个名字是嫌犯为了误导调查故意起的

translation.en: He wants us to believe that he's Japanese, operating a half a world away.
translation.zh: 他想让我们以为他是个日本人在十万八千里之外作案

translation.en: He's not.
translation.zh: 然而他不是

translation.en: Kira's in Seattle.
translation.zh: 基拉就在西雅图

translation.en: Shall we help one another?
translation.zh: 我们一起合作 你意下如何？

translation.en: "Justice for the Wicked." What is this?
translation.zh: “恶人接受正义的制裁” 这是什么？

translation.en: It's a site for Kira worshipers.
translation.zh: 它是一个为基拉的崇拜者建立的网站

translation.en: They put up names of people that deserve to die.
translation.zh: 他们会把应死之人的名字放在网站上

translation.en: [Light] Holy shit.
translation.zh: 天呐

translation.en: [Mia] Rapists, pedophiles,
translation.zh: 强奸犯、恋童癖

translation.en: human trafficking, murder.
translation.zh: 人贩子、杀人犯

translation.en: This guy killed four people in a house fire.
translation.zh: 这个人在一场房屋纵火案中杀了四个人

translation.en: I don't know. How do we know that it's real?
translation.zh: 我们怎么知道是真是假？

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: What if somebody fucked your girlfriend and you put him on the list to kill him?
translation.zh: 万一是有人睡了你女朋友他想让他死而把名字放上去呢？

translation.en: What would you do if some guy fucked me?
translation.zh: 如果有人睡了我 你会怎么做？

translation.en: -[stammers] Oh, I'd kill him. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -我会杀了他-是吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -You'd kill him?
translation.zh: -是的-你会杀了他？

translation.en: -Yeah. -You'd kill him?
translation.zh: -没错-杀了他？

translation.en: But that is the reason why we can't kill people based on website rumors.
translation.zh: 好吧 但正因如此我们才不能根据网络谣言杀人

translation.en: It's not like that.
translation.zh: 不是你说的那样

translation.en: These are real people with real problems, and they've been ignored.
translation.zh: 这些人真实存在 他们确实有麻烦而且一直被忽视

translation.en: They need our help.
translation.zh: 他们需要我们的帮助

translation.en: [Light's father] Figured you'd be older.
translation.zh: 没想到你这么年轻

translation.en: And that I'd be able to see more of your face.
translation.zh: 总得让我看看你长什么样子吧

translation.en: Yes, well, I find I'm not in a very trusting mood these days.
translation.zh: 没错 可最近我没什么心情相信别人

translation.en: I took the liberty of moving your evidence to a more secure location.
translation.zh: 我擅自做主 把你手里的证据转移到了一个更安全的地方

translation.en: Oh, I can see that. Were you gonna let me know or...?
translation.zh: 我看出来了 你是打算告诉我还是…

translation.en: Wow, this is very, very impressive, James. Your men must be proud.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯 你的调查成果令人刮目相看你手下的人一定非常自豪

translation.en: Ask your partner how my men think about me these days.
translation.zh: 问问你的同伴我手下的人现在如何看我

translation.en: So you did all of this yourself?
translation.zh: 那是你自己完成的？

translation.en: Even more impressive.
translation.zh: 那就更了不起了

translation.en: Please, James, have a seat. Rest your glutes.
translation.zh: 请坐吧 詹姆斯 歇歇脚

translation.en: Mm-mmm. You've made two mistakes.
translation.zh: 你犯了两个错误

translation.en: This is zero day, Kira's first recorded murders.
translation.zh: 这是第一次 基拉的第一起谋杀案

translation.en: But previously, on April 15th, convicted felon James W. Brode
translation.zh: 但在此之前 4月15日被定罪的重犯詹姆斯W布罗德

translation.en: had taken his wife and children hostage.
translation.zh: 劫持了他的妻子和孩子

translation.en: I remember that. You think that was Kira?
translation.zh: 我记得 你认为那个案子也是基拉犯下的？

translation.en: [L] Initial speculation was that his behavior was drug-related,
translation.zh: 初始调查认为布罗德的行为与吸毒有关

translation.en: but lost in the ensuing crush of Kira activities
translation.zh: 但真正的调查结果湮没在人们对基拉的追捧中

translation.en: was the fact that Brode's toxicology had come back clean.
translation.zh: 其实布罗德的毒理测验结果是干净的

translation.en: The stand-off had never made national news,
translation.zh: 这次对峙一直没能成为全国新闻

translation.en: and it was only broadcast on local Seattle stations.
translation.zh: 只有西雅图地方电视台报道了此案

translation.en: -So that's how you knew he was here. -I infiltrated your network
translation.zh: -所以你依此推断他在西雅图-我进入了你们的网络系统

translation.en: in order to ensure that there hadn't been a data breach.
translation.zh: 以确保之前没有数据泄露

translation.en: Prior to my access, the network was intact.
translation.zh: 在我进入之前系统没有被入侵的痕迹 （西雅图警局事故报告）

translation.en: Did you just hand me evidence you hacked the Seattle P.D.?
translation.zh: （西雅图警局事故报告） 你刚给我的证据是从西雅图警局窃取的？

translation.en: I handed you evidence that whoever Kira is,
translation.zh: 我给你的证据说明不论基拉是谁

translation.en: they have access to the database from the inside.
translation.zh: 他们可以从警局内部进入数据库

translation.en: Kira's one of ours.
translation.zh: 基拉是我们的人

translation.en: Here's a cross-reference list of officers and their access
translation.zh: 这是一份警官登录系统时间

translation.en: as well as the dates of Kira activities.
translation.zh: 与基拉活动时间的交叉对比列表

translation.en: The Federal Administration has agreed to make resources available to us.
translation.zh: 联邦政府已经同意我们调用资源

translation.en: We can begin seeing who was where when.
translation.zh: 我们可以从调查每个人的行踪开始

translation.en: -What are you gonna do? -I'd like to start by speaking with Kira.
translation.zh: -你打算怎么做？-我想先同基拉说上话

translation.en: Sure you are. [low chuckle]
translation.zh: 你当然想了

translation.en: -Hey. -Light, turn on the news.
translation.zh: -嘿-莱特 快看新闻

translation.en: The individual known as Kira,
translation.zh: 这个叫做基拉的人

translation.en: as I'm sure you're aware, has taken credit for over 400 deaths.
translation.zh: 我相信大家都知道已经杀了四百余人

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: While we don't know how he kills his victims,
translation.zh: 尽管我们还不知道他是如何杀死受害者的

translation.en: we do know how he chooses them.
translation.zh: 但我们知道他是如何挑选受害者的

translation.en: Prior to these deaths,
translation.zh: 死亡事件发生之前

translation.en: all of the victims have had their identities released to the media.
translation.zh: 所有受害者的身份都曾被发布到媒体上

translation.en: This would suggest that Kira is not some omnipotent force.
translation.zh: 这就说明基拉并非无所不能

translation.en: He's a person...
translation.zh: 他是个人

translation.en: like you or me.
translation.zh: 像你我一样的普通人

translation.en: He is also a coward.
translation.zh: 他还是一个懦夫

translation.en: A child wielding power he does not understand,
translation.zh: 一个操控他并不熟知的力量的孩子

translation.en: mistakenly believing in doing so, he's at no risk to himself.
translation.zh: 他错误地以为这么做不会危及到自己

translation.en: He's wrong.
translation.zh: 他错了

translation.en: Kira, if you're watching this, know that I am coming for you.
translation.zh: 基拉 如果你正在看着记住 我要将你绳之以法

translation.en: Unless, of course, you'd like to kill me right now.
translation.zh: 当然 除非你现在就杀了我

translation.en: Now I'm rooting for this guy.
translation.zh: 我可要好好给这人加油

translation.en: Would you shut the fuck up?
translation.zh: 你他妈的能不能闭嘴？

translation.en: No?
translation.zh: 杀不了我吗？

translation.en: Well, in that case, Kira,
translation.zh: 这样的话 基拉

translation.en: I shall be meeting you face-to-face very shortly.
translation.zh: 我们很快就能见面

translation.en: Who does this guy think he is?
translation.zh: 这家伙以为自己是谁？

translation.en: What the fuck was that?
translation.zh: 你在搞什么鬼？

translation.en: I have a theory.
translation.zh: 我有个推论

translation.en: Kira cannot kill by simply sight alone.
translation.zh: 只知道长相 基拉无法杀人

translation.en: He needs a name and a face.
translation.zh: 他需要同时知道名字和长相

translation.en: Every victim we've seen so far fits this pattern.
translation.zh: 目前所有的受害者都符合这个推论

translation.en: So you antagonize him on purpose?
translation.zh: 所以你才故意挑衅他？

translation.en: While withholding my identity from the record.
translation.zh: 同时隐瞒我自己的身份

translation.en: Now, we know that he wants to kill me but is unable.
translation.zh: 现在我们知道他想杀我 却无从下手

translation.en: And what if you're wrong?
translation.zh: 万一你的推测是错的呢？

translation.en: Then, James, I'd be dead.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯 那样的话我早就死了

translation.en: Either way, we'll have gained valuable information.
translation.zh: 不论是对是错我们获取到了宝贵的信息

translation.en: He always pull this kind of stuff?
translation.zh: 他经常玩这种把戏？

translation.en: [Light] You guys getting close to catching Kira?
translation.zh: 你们是不是快要抓到基拉了？

translation.en: Oh, I'd say the haystack's down to a hay pile. Still a lot of hay.
translation.zh: 虽然有了进展 但依然是大海捞针

translation.en: I saw the press conference today.
translation.zh: 我看了今天的新闻发布会

translation.en: Who's that guy on TV with the turtleneck?
translation.zh: 电视上穿套头衣的那个人是谁？

translation.en: You like that look? I'm thinking of taking it myself.
translation.zh: 你喜欢那种打扮？我都想弄一身试试

translation.en: Goes by L. He's an independent investigator.
translation.zh: 他叫L 是一个独立调查员

translation.en: Wow, so you don't even know his real name.
translation.zh: 这么说你都不知道他的真名

translation.en: About the only thing I know is he's got some handler named Watari.
translation.zh: 我唯一知道的是 他有个帮手叫亘理

translation.en: Really likes ice cream.
translation.zh: 非常喜欢吃冰激凌

translation.en: He's connected an awful lot of dots.
translation.zh: 他找出了很多线索之间的关联

translation.en: Do you think he's connected the dots because he's Kira?
translation.zh: 他能找到关联 说不定他就是基拉呢

translation.en: I don't think so.
translation.zh: 我不这么认为

translation.en: He has a history of cracking big cases.
translation.zh: 他破了好多大案

translation.en: Besides, I think you can tell when you're sitting across from a killer like Kira.
translation.zh: 而且 如果基拉那样的杀手坐在对面 我一定能感觉出来

translation.en: Right. Of course.
translation.zh: 好吧 当然了

translation.en: What happens when they catch Kira?
translation.zh: 如果基拉被抓住会是什么下场？

translation.en: Well... he's murdered over 400 people,
translation.zh: 这个么…他谋杀了四百多人

translation.en: so, my guess...
translation.zh: 所以我猜…

translation.en: it's probably gonna be a fight between those who want to hang him
translation.zh: 到时候想要处死他的人和那些想要研究分析他

translation.en: and those who want to dissect him and figure out how he did it.
translation.zh: 找出他犯罪方式的人绝对会进行一场大战

translation.en: -You okay? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-没事

translation.en: You put someone on my kid?
translation.zh: 你派人跟踪我儿子？

translation.en: We agreed that everyone with access needed to be thoroughly vetted.
translation.zh: 我们说好的 所有有权进入数据库的人都要经过彻底审查

translation.en: I did not see it prudent to have you investigate yourself.
translation.zh: 如果让你进行自我审查的话我觉得有些不太谨慎

translation.en: What? We're not talking about investigating me.
translation.zh: 你在说什么？我跟你谈的不是针对我的调查

translation.en: We're talking about having my son followed!
translation.zh: 而是你派人跟踪我儿子！

translation.en: I investigated you prior to offering my assistance
translation.zh: 我向你提供帮助之前就已经调查过你了

translation.en: and concluded you are not Kira.
translation.zh: 调查结果证明你不是基拉

translation.en: As for your son, he may have access to databases
translation.zh: 至于你儿子 他也有可能进入

translation.en: around which we have centered our search.
translation.zh: 被我们作为调查中心的数据库

translation.en: Therefore, deserves the same scrutiny as anyone else that fits that criteria.
translation.zh: 因此 像其他符合调查标准的人一样他也应该接受审查

translation.en: -No, he's a kid! -Yes.
translation.zh: -不行 他就是个孩子！-没错

translation.en: -A particularly bright kid. -You know what?
translation.zh: -一个极其聪明的孩子-这么跟你说吧

translation.en: If you had any questions about my son, you should've come to me.
translation.zh: 如果你对我儿子有任何疑问你应该直接来找我

translation.en: [woman] Here you go.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: [Light] Even if they're suspicious, I don't see how they can prove it.
translation.zh: 即便他们怀疑 也不能证明我有罪

translation.en: I think we just go quiet until they stop following us.
translation.zh: 我觉得在他们停止跟踪之前我们应该暂时收手

translation.en: -What do you mean "go quiet"? -Stop fucking around with theDeath Note.
translation.zh: -“收手”是什么意思？-不再用《死亡笔记》搞事

translation.en: Is that what you think we're doing?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们是在“搞事”？

translation.en: Come on, Light. Just get rid of them. All we need is a name.
translation.zh: 得了吧 莱特 把他们除掉就好了我们只需知道他的名字

translation.en: -I'm not gonna do that. -Not gonna do what?
translation.zh: -我不会那么做的-不会做什么？

translation.en: -I was talking to Ryuk. -I like this one, Light.
translation.zh: -我在跟流愚说话-我喜欢这姑娘 莱特

translation.en: -She has wonderful ideas. -What'd he say?
translation.zh: -她有很多不错的创意-他说什么？

translation.en: Ryuk? Not much.
translation.zh: 流愚吗？他话不多

translation.en: -We're good. They're trying to stop us. -We don't kill innocent people, Mia.
translation.zh: 我们是好人 他们在妨碍我们 我们不能杀无辜的人 米娅

translation.en: Even if I wanted to, which I don't,
translation.zh: 且不说我不想这么做 即便我想

translation.en: taking out the guy following us will only indicate that it's me.
translation.zh: 杀掉跟踪我们的人只会证明我就是基拉

translation.en: You'd have to get rid of all the agents, regardless of who they're following.
translation.zh: 你必须除掉所有特工不管他们是在跟踪谁

translation.en: They wouldn't know who it was,
translation.zh: 这样他们不会知道基拉是谁

translation.en: but they'd know what happens when you fuck with Kira.
translation.zh: 但他们会知道坏基拉的事会是什么下场

translation.en: -Can't believe you're saying this. -Cant believe you're not.
translation.zh: -这种话太离谱了-不这样说才离谱

translation.en: Then I guess we're really fucking lucky that it's my book.
translation.zh: 那我真该庆幸笔记本是我的

translation.en: [female reporter] Kira has been strangely inactive of late,
translation.zh: 基拉最近出奇地低调

translation.en: something authorities are eager to point to
translation.zh: 随着相关部门的调查取得进展

translation.en: as evidence their investigation is gaining momentum.
translation.zh: 他们迫切地想要民众关注到这一点

translation.en: However, Kira supporters have begun to criticize police
translation.zh: 然而 由于基拉的不作为全球范围内

translation.en: for suppressing its activities,
translation.zh: 出现了犯罪浪潮的小高峰

translation.en: as a small but noticeable spike in global crime
translation.zh: 这就使得基拉的支持者们

translation.en: has become apparent in the absence of recent activities from the phenomena.
translation.zh: 开始批判警方对基拉的压制

translation.en: [Light] Are you leaving?
translation.zh: 你要走吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I've got some work to do.
translation.zh: 嗯 我还有事要做

translation.en: There's a guy on the news who killed a couple kids.
translation.zh: 新闻里有个人杀了几个孩子

translation.en: I thought maybe we could make some popcorn, take some names down for later.
translation.zh: 也许我们可以做些爆米花然后记几个名字备用

translation.en: I'll see you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天见

translation.en: Director Pearl. These just came in from the field offices.
translation.zh: 珀尔局长 这些是外勤人员刚刚传回来的

translation.en: Tell them to keep surveillance on all the potential--
translation.zh: 让他们继续监视所有潜在…

translation.en: Assistant Director Pearl is dead. Heart attack, just now.
translation.zh: 助理局长珀尔刚刚去世了心脏病突发

translation.en: We need to contact every FBI agent on their team.
translation.zh: 我们需要联系他那个组所有的联邦调查局特工

translation.en: This is Franks.
translation.zh: 我是弗兰克斯

translation.en: Agent Franks, your team has been compromised.
translation.zh: 弗兰克斯特工 你们的队伍中有内鬼

translation.en: Drop what you're doing and get to the nearest hospital. Right now.
translation.zh: 放下手头的工作赶到最近的医院 马上就去

translation.en: Agent Franks?
translation.zh: 弗兰克斯特工？

translation.en: Agent Franks, can you hear me?
translation.zh: 弗兰克斯特工 你还在听吗？

translation.en: [female reporter] Twelve FBI agents mysteriously commit suicide.
translation.zh: 12名联邦调查局特工离奇自杀

translation.en: Some sources say it was the work of Kira.
translation.zh: 有消息声称此事是基拉所为

translation.en: This is the first time Kira has attacked law enforcement.
translation.zh: 这是基拉首次袭击执法部门

translation.en: -[Mia] Slow down for one second? -He did it! Son of a bitch killed them.
translation.zh: -你能不能等等我？-是他干的！是那个混蛋杀了他们

translation.en: -Ryuk? -There's so many rules in that thing!
translation.zh: -流愚？-笔记本里规则太多了！

translation.en: There must be some kind of loophole.
translation.zh: 肯定存在某种漏洞

translation.en: What's he gonna do if you go after him?
translation.zh: 要是你追杀他 他会怎么对你？

translation.en: Maybe you just need to take a minute and relax
translation.zh: 也许你只需停下来 放松一下

translation.en: and see if this was the best thing that could've happened.
translation.zh: 好好想想 说不定这是件好事

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [Light] Ryuk!
translation.zh: 流愚！

translation.en: [Ryuk] You think I'm some dog, Light?
translation.zh: 你以为我是你的宠物狗吗 莱特？

translation.en: You can just snap your fingers and I'll come running? [chewing]
translation.zh: 召之即来 挥之即去？

translation.en: -Did you kill those FBI agents? -What do you think?
translation.zh: -那些联邦调查局特工是你杀的吗？-你觉得呢？

translation.en: I decide who dies, you obey me. Those are the rules.
translation.zh: 我来决定人的生死 你要服从我这是规则

translation.en: -Who do you think wrote the rules? -Whose side are you on?
translation.zh: -你觉得规则是谁定下的？-你到底站哪边？

translation.en: There are no sides, only the game.
translation.zh: 没有什么站哪边的问题一切都是游戏

translation.en: And I knew eventually you wouldn't be able to handle playing.
translation.zh: 我早就料到你玩不起

translation.en: I asked politely, but you didn't hear me.
translation.zh: 我好言好语地问过你但你就是听不出来

translation.en: Let the note go.
translation.zh: 放弃笔记本吧

translation.en: Look at the strife it's causing you and your little girlfriend.
translation.zh: 它只会在你跟你那小女友之间引发摩擦

translation.en: Let me find it a new home. We'll be free of each other.
translation.zh: 让我为它找一个新的归宿这样我们就彼此解脱了

translation.en: I'm not gonna give the note to you or anybody else,
translation.zh: 我不会把笔记本交给你也不会交给任何人

translation.en: and if you fuck with me again, I'm gonna put your name in it.
translation.zh: 如果你再坏我的事我就把你的名字写到上面

translation.en: You could try. [laughs]
translation.zh: 你可以试试

translation.en: But I warn you, there are four letters in my name.
translation.zh: 但我警告你 我的名字里有四个字母

translation.en: Most anyone's ever gotten were two.
translation.zh: 有人最多曾经猜对过两个

translation.en: [male reporter] We interrupt this to take you live to an announcement...
translation.zh: 节目为您插播詹姆斯特纳…

translation.en: -What the fuck is he doing? -...by James Turner,
translation.zh: -他要干嘛？-本地基拉案调查组长

translation.en: local head of the Kira investigation.
translation.zh: 现场发表紧急声明

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: Those of you that harbored any illusions about what Kira really is,
translation.zh: 那些对基拉的真实面目心存幻想的人你们听好了

translation.en: the cold-blooded murder of a dozen FBI agents
translation.zh: 他残忍地杀害了多名美国联邦调查局特工

translation.en: should lay bare his true nature.
translation.zh: 你们该认清他的邪恶本性了

translation.en: Kira is a cowardly criminal thug concerned only with self-preservation.
translation.zh: 基拉是个没种的罪犯暴徒只知道自保

translation.en: Not only is he unworthy
translation.zh: 从今天开始 他不仅不值得

translation.en: of the veneration and celebration he's received in certain circles,
translation.zh: 某些人对他的崇敬和颂扬

translation.en: as of today, he's not even worthy of our fear.
translation.zh: 他甚至都不值得我们的恐惧

translation.en: Understand this, Kira.
translation.zh: 你听好了 基拉

translation.en: You may strike me down, but another one will stand up and take my place.
translation.zh: 你或许可以打倒我但一定会有后来人继续我的使命

translation.en: Why would he do that? He's forcing Kira to retaliate.
translation.zh: 他干嘛要那么做？他这是逼迫基拉实施报复

translation.en: ...and another for as long as need be.
translation.zh: 后继人无穷无尽 直至我们取得胜利

translation.en: We will not waiver.
translation.zh: 我们不会放弃

translation.en: -Because he's not afraid. -We will not submit.
translation.zh: -因为他不怕-我们不会投降

translation.en: And we will not fail.
translation.zh: 我们一定会胜利

translation.en: Where is it?
translation.zh: 笔记本在哪儿？

translation.en: What? Are you out of your mind? That's my fucking dad!
translation.zh: 你干嘛？你疯了吗？他可是我爸！

translation.en: Yeah, and he just dared us to kill him on live television.
translation.zh: 没错 可他刚在电视直播上挑衅我们杀死他

translation.en: Think people are gonna be on their knees if he can talk to Kira like that?
translation.zh: 你以为他那样挑衅基拉人们就会屈服吗？

translation.en: We're not killing my dad! This is over! Ryuk fucked us!
translation.zh: 我们不能杀我爸！米娅到此为止！流愚耍了我们！

translation.en: We're not the good guys anymore.
translation.zh: 我们不再是好人了

translation.en: [Mia] What happened to the boy that wanted the world to get what he got?
translation.zh: 那个想帮助所有人获得公平正义的男孩哪儿去了？

translation.en: Think about your mom, Light.
translation.zh: 想想你妈妈 莱特

translation.en: Either Kira stands up or they hunt us down.
translation.zh: 要不然基拉出手要不然我们就会被他们捕获

translation.en: If you want out, then just get the fuck out!
translation.zh: 如果你想退出 现在就退！

translation.en: So you just want to quit?
translation.zh: 这么说你真想洗手不干了？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Well said, James. Tell me, are you truly ready to give your life?
translation.zh: 刚才的演讲真是精彩 詹姆斯告诉我 你真准备好牺牲了吗？

translation.en: If that's what it takes.
translation.zh: 如果有这个必要的话

translation.en: How long will it take him to decide, I wonder?
translation.zh: 他会多久作出决定？让我猜猜

translation.en: [James] What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: [sighs] Let me take this.
translation.zh: 让我接个电话

translation.en: -Turner. -This is L.
translation.zh: -我是特纳-我是L

translation.en: Just making sure you hadn't died.
translation.zh: 就是打电话确认一下你还没死

translation.en: [sighs] Still here.
translation.zh: 我还活着

translation.en: Excellent. Carry on.
translation.zh: 很好 加油哦

translation.en: I'm really proud of you.
translation.zh: 我真的很为你自豪

translation.en: [James on TV] Understand this, Kira.
translation.zh: 你听好了 基拉

translation.en: -You may strike me down... -Sir?
translation.zh: -你或许可以打倒我…-先生？

translation.en: -...but another will take my place. -Light Turner is Kira.
translation.zh: -但一定会有后来人继续我的使命-莱特特纳就是基拉

translation.en: -And another and another... -How long since you've slept?
translation.zh: -后继人无穷无尽…-你多久没睡了？

translation.en: -...for as long as need be. -Thirty-one hours.
translation.zh: -直至我们取得胜利-31个小时

translation.en: -We will not waiver. We will not submit. -Sleep is key to strong thought.
translation.zh: -我们不会放弃 我们不会投降-睡眠是有效思维的保证

translation.en: -Trust me. -And we will not fail.
translation.zh: -相信我-我们一定会胜利

translation.en: Nothing's gonna change once I wake up.
translation.zh: 就算我睡了 醒来也还是这个结论

translation.en: Hello, Light.
translation.zh: 你好 莱特

translation.en: You're the guy. You're L.
translation.zh: 你就是那个人 你是L

translation.en: Yeah, well, it's not my real name.
translation.zh: 没错 L并非我的真名

translation.en: But I'm sure you're painfully aware of that.
translation.zh: 这点你肯定知道 也为此苦恼不已

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来这里干嘛？

translation.en: Following a lead. You?
translation.zh: 追踪一条线索 你呢？

translation.en: Um... I was just... I'm leaving.
translation.zh: 我刚…刚准备走

translation.en: I wonder if it was a difficult decision.
translation.zh: 不知道你做那个决定的时候是不是特别煎熬

translation.en: If what was a difficult decision?
translation.zh: 什么特别煎熬的决定？

translation.en: Sparing your father's life.
translation.zh: 饶你父亲不死

translation.en: Sorry, what are you talking about?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你在说什么？

translation.en: You must've known it would implicate you, yet you couldn't bring yourself to do it.
translation.zh: 你肯定早就想到这会连累你 但你还是不忍心下手

translation.en: I'll admit, I always wondered if you had a line.
translation.zh: 我承认 我一直都在想你是否有底线

translation.en: I guess it's fortunate for us,
translation.zh: 我觉得 你最终划下的这条线

translation.en: the line you finally decided to draw points so clearly in your direction.
translation.zh: 把我对基拉的猜测引到你身上这对你我来说都是好事

translation.en: -So you really think I'm Kira. -No, I know it.
translation.zh: -你真以为我就是基拉-不 我很肯定

translation.en: If you're so sure, why haven't you just arrested me?
translation.zh: 既然你如此肯定为什么还不逮捕我？

translation.en: Because I don't do check, Light. Only checkmate.
translation.zh: 因为我不出手则已一出手必须一招毙命

translation.en: -But we'll be there soon enough. -Great. Until then, enjoy the gelato.
translation.zh: -但我很快就会出手的-很好 在那之前 好好吃你的冰激凌

translation.en: Assuming you can eat through that thing. And I'll just, uh...
translation.zh: 如果你还吃得完的话 我就…

translation.en: Can I ask you something?
translation.zh: 能问你件事吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 可以

translation.en: How do you think he does it? Kira.
translation.zh: 你觉得他是如何杀人的？我是说基拉

translation.en: I was hoping you could shed some light on that for me.
translation.zh: 我还打算你给我点儿启发呢

translation.en: I have a theory.
translation.zh: 我是这么想的

translation.en: I think that it's some form of remote viewing
translation.zh: 我觉得他依靠的是某种形式的遥视潜能

translation.en: coupled with maybe some latent psychic ability of some sort. Am I close?
translation.zh: 说不定再加上某种潜在的通灵能力 我猜得准不准？

translation.en: So you really have no idea, do you?
translation.zh: 所以你真的不知道 对吧？

translation.en: Well, I have several ideas.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 我有好几种想法

translation.en: Eventually, you'll tell me which is correct.
translation.zh: 但终究你会告诉我正确答案

translation.en: What if it turned out that all arresting Kira did
translation.zh: 如果抓到基拉只会

translation.en: was give that power to someone else, someone potentially much worse.
translation.zh: 促使其他人获得这种力量一些更加邪恶残暴的人

translation.en: You're suggesting the ability is somehow transferable.
translation.zh: 你是说这种能力是可以转移的

translation.en: I'm suggesting maybe what you and the person you're after want
translation.zh: 我是说也许你和你在追查的人

translation.en: isn't so different.
translation.zh: 没多大区别

translation.en: Maybe they're as ready to see the killing end as you are.
translation.zh: 也许他们也跟你一样等着看杀戮的好戏呢

translation.en: And if that were true, perhaps now would be a good time
translation.zh: 如果我说的都是真的也许现在你应该帮助他们

translation.en: to start helping them instead of hunting them.
translation.zh: 而不是追捕他们

translation.en: Helping...
translation.zh: 帮助…

translation.en: You know what I think, Light? I think you want to make a deal.
translation.zh: 你知道我是怎么想的吗 莱特？我觉得你是想跟我做个交易

translation.en: Good deals are made by those in a position of strength.
translation.zh: 划算的交易都是由那些强势的人开条件

translation.en: Criminals, such as yourself, never make those deals.
translation.zh: 像你这样的罪犯 根本没资格讲条件

translation.en: What they do is wait until they're caught and then they beg.
translation.zh: 你们只能等到被抓后 苦苦求饶

translation.en: I'm not begging. I'm telling you that you don't understand.
translation.zh: 我没在求你 我是在告诉你你根本就不理解

translation.en: Let me put this in terms you're more familiar with.
translation.zh: 这么跟你说吧

translation.en: A man kills 400 people.
translation.zh: 一个杀了400个人的凶手

translation.en: He tells us that it's complicated, that he's misunderstood.
translation.zh: 他告诉我们一切都很复杂还说他遭到了误解

translation.en: Do you think that Kira would hear his excuses or walk him off a bridge?
translation.zh: 你觉得基拉是会听进去他的借口还是会送他归西？

translation.en: Think you're better than me, but you're trying to kill Kira!
translation.zh: 你比我好不到哪里去但是你想杀基拉！

translation.en: -Kira, Kira, Kira! -I do not kill, Light!
translation.zh: 我不杀人 莱特！

translation.en: I don't even carry a gun, it's distracting.
translation.zh: 我甚至都不带枪 它容易让我分心

translation.en: What I do is bring people to justice.
translation.zh: 我的使命是让坏人伏法

translation.en: But the form it takes is their own making. A consequence of their actions, not mine.
translation.zh: 但我不会加入自己的个人意志而是会让他们自食其果

translation.en: You're the one who flew into the sun.
translation.zh: 是你自己要玩火的

translation.en: I'm just here to make sure you actually burn.
translation.zh: 我来是为了保证你一定会被烧死

translation.en: -Well, if that's how it has to be. -It is, Light!
translation.zh: -如果非要如此收场的话-一定会！

translation.en: You know that as well as I do. There are no draws in this game.
translation.zh: 这点你跟我一样清楚这场游戏不会以平局结束

translation.en: -Please, you have to forgive me. -It was my dad, Mia.
translation.zh: -求你了 你一定要原谅我-那可是我爸

translation.en: If I could take it back, I would. I promise. I was just scared.
translation.zh: 如果能收回的话 我一定会的我发誓 我就是吓坏了

translation.en: Do you think I'm not scared?
translation.zh: 你以为我不害怕吗？

translation.en: I'm a fucking cheerleader, Light.
translation.zh: 莱特 我不过是个拉拉队队长

translation.en: Nothing I do has ever mattered until I met you.
translation.zh: 我碰到你之前一直过着平庸的生活

translation.en: I made a mistake. If I could take it back, I would. I just...
translation.zh: 我犯了错 如果能收回 我一定会改

translation.en: I wasn't ready to lose you.
translation.zh: 我不想失去你

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: L showed me his face.
translation.zh: L让我看了他的脸

translation.en: I'm gonna get his name, and I'm gonna stop him.
translation.zh: 我需要知道他的名字 然后阻止他

translation.en: That's Watari. He's L's right-hand man.
translation.zh: （基拉专案组记者会） 那人是亘理 他是L的贴身助理

translation.en: If anybody's gonna give us L's real name, it's gonna be him.
translation.zh: 要真有人知道L的真名肯定就是他了

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Light] "Watari becomes obsessed
translation.zh: “亘理迫切想要

translation.en: with revealing the true identity of the detective known as 'L.'
translation.zh: 揭穿L侦探的真实身份

translation.en: For the next 48 hours, he will cease all communication with the outside world,
translation.zh: 未来48小时除了打给2065550166

translation.en: except to update what he learns to the number 206-555-0166.
translation.zh: 汇报调查进展他会停止与外界的一切沟通

translation.en: At 7:00 p.m., on October 12th, he dies."
translation.zh: 他会在10月12日晚上七点死去”

translation.en: [Ryuk] You didn't say how he dies.
translation.zh: 你没写他会怎么死

translation.en: -It doesn't matter, it's dealer's choice. -What?
translation.zh: -无所谓 你看着办-你说什么？

translation.en: Huh? Oh, I was talking to Ryuk. Sorry.
translation.zh: 我在跟流愚说话 抱歉

translation.en: -So kill his friend to get his name? -No, I'm not gonna kill Watari.
translation.zh: -为了知道他名字 杀了他朋友？-不 我不会杀亘理的

translation.en: That's the best part.
translation.zh: 这才是绝妙之处

translation.en: Rule 89 says:
translation.zh: 规则89说道：

translation.en: "If the person who writes a name destroys its page
translation.zh: “如果写下名字的人在受害人死之前

translation.en: prior to the death being carried out, the target will be spared."
translation.zh: 毁掉写有名字的那页受害人就会免于一死”

translation.en: So if I burn Watari's page before October 12th at 7:00 p.m...
translation.zh: 只要我在10月12日晚上七点之前烧掉写有亘理名字的那页

translation.en: then nothing bad happens, right, Ryuk?
translation.zh: 他就不会死了 对吗 流愚？

translation.en: Only one name can be removed from the Death Note by burning it.
translation.zh: 这种特权《死亡笔记》只允许使用一次

translation.en: Get this one wrong, you won't get another chance.
translation.zh: 要是你搞砸了 绝不会有第二次机会

translation.en: I only get one page to burn.
translation.zh: 我只能饶恕一人

translation.en: -Hello? -My name is Watari.
translation.zh: -您哪位？-我是亘理

translation.en: -This information is not known to me. -I'm sorry. What do you mean?
translation.zh: -我不知道L的真名是什么-抱歉 你什么意思？

translation.en: I took responsibility for L
translation.zh: 我接手照顾L

translation.en: only after he left the St. Martin's orphanage in Montauk
translation.zh: 是在他离开蒙托克的圣马丁孤儿院后

translation.en: where he was one of the Rochester wards.
translation.zh: 他在孤儿院是一名罗切斯特孤童

translation.en: One of the... Sorry, what is a Rochester ward?
translation.zh: 什么是罗切斯特孤童？

translation.en: They were orphans trained since childhood
translation.zh: 他们都是孤儿 从小接受训练

translation.en: to become the greatest detectives the world had ever seen.
translation.zh: 目标是成为世界上最伟大的侦探

translation.en: -You've gotta be kidding me. -I am not.
translation.zh: -你没在跟我开玩笑吧-没有

translation.en: For their first test, the wards were placed in a conditioning vault.
translation.zh: 第一阶段的筛选是把那些孤儿放在狭小的地下室里

translation.en: Those who retained their sanity after seven months
translation.zh: 七个月后那些没疯的孩子

translation.en: were initiated into the program.
translation.zh: 会被选入训练项目

translation.en: L joined at six, the youngest candidate ever.
translation.zh: L在六岁时便被选入他是有史以来最年轻的受训人

translation.en: Okay, but what was his name before the vault or whatever?
translation.zh: 好吧 但在接受筛选之前他的真名是什么？

translation.en: That name exists now only in their records.
translation.zh: 他的名字只能在那个地方的档案室里找到

translation.en: Okay. Okay. Watari, you need to go there right now.
translation.zh: 好的 亘理 你马上过去那里

translation.en: I should like to rest first.
translation.zh: 我想先休息一下

translation.en: Sleep is key to strong thought.
translation.zh: 睡眠是有效思维的保证

translation.en: No. You don't have any time to sleep. You have 48 hours to get a name.
translation.zh: 不 你没时间休息了你只有48个小时的时间找出名字

translation.en: What happens in 48 hours?
translation.zh: 那48个小时后呢？

translation.en: -You just need to go right now. -I will go.
translation.zh: -你现在就得出发-我这就去

translation.en: -Leave him alive, it's a loose end. -You don't need to help, Mia.
translation.zh: -不杀他的话 就会成为后顾之忧-不用你帮我 米娅

translation.en: Of course I do.
translation.zh: 我当然要帮你

translation.en: I'm not gonna leave you alone in this.
translation.zh: 事已至此 我不会丢下你一个人不管

translation.en: [James] I'm telling you, I wore an actual top hat.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 我戴的真是一顶帽子…

translation.en: -And was that with your wife or...? -No.
translation.zh: -那是你妻子吗 还是…-不

translation.en: Frankly, she wouldn't have been caught within ten miles of me.
translation.zh: 实话说 上高中那会儿我根本约不到她

translation.en: I didn't get this cool until much later.
translation.zh: 那时我完全不像现在这么酷

translation.en: Hello. Nice to meet you. Leave.
translation.zh: 你好 见到你们很高兴 赶紧离开

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来我家干嘛？

translation.en: We have a critical issue that requires discussion immediately.
translation.zh: 出了一个紧急问题需要我们赶紧讨论一下

translation.en: -Kids, give us a couple minutes. -Sure.
translation.zh: -孩子们 让我们单独聊会儿-没问题

translation.en: No, wait, wait, wait.
translation.zh: 不 等下

translation.en: Not you, Light.
translation.zh: 莱特 你别走

translation.en: The discussion concerns you.
translation.zh: 本次讨论跟你有关

translation.en: How?
translation.zh: 怎么有关？

translation.en: Watari has disappeared.
translation.zh: 亘理失踪了

translation.en: I've known him my entire life.
translation.zh: 我认识他多年

translation.en: He has not, would not, could not leave without me being sure of his plans.
translation.zh: 在我没有同意他的计划前他从不会 也不可能无故离开

translation.en: -Okay, let me make a call. -What is it that you want?
translation.zh: -好吧 我打个电话-你到底是什么目的？

translation.en: -Sorry, I don't have any idea. -I get that this has got you upset.
translation.zh: -抱歉 我毫不知情-我明白你为这事着急

translation.en: Your son is Kira, James!
translation.zh: 你儿子就是基拉 詹姆斯！

translation.en: What? Don't know why you haven't been able to put one and one together,
translation.zh: -你说什么？-我不明白 他都饶你一命了

translation.en: even despite him having spared your life,
translation.zh: 你怎么还是想不明白

translation.en: but it does not speak well to your deductive abilities at all.
translation.zh: 这说明你的推理能力不怎么好

translation.en: It's time to leave.
translation.zh: 你该走了

translation.en: -I'm not going anywhere. -Wanna fucking bet?
translation.zh: -我哪儿也不去-想打个赌吗？

translation.en: I have a search warrant and a team of men outside.
translation.zh: 我手里有搜查证还有一队人在外面待命

translation.en: So, as I said, I will be staying. You? You have managed a strong move.
translation.zh: 所以 像我刚才说的 我不会走的而你？这招棋走得够狠

translation.en: Now, provided that you return Watari to me safely,
translation.zh: 如果你能把亘理安全交还给我

translation.en: I'm willing to put your position of strength into account.
translation.zh: 这次我就放你一马

translation.en: I'm sorry about your friend. I'm sure he'll be fine.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉你朋友不见了我相信他不会有事

translation.en: -Damn it! You don't have-- -[both grunting]
translation.zh: -真是混蛋！-你敢！

translation.en: You have crossed the line!
translation.zh: 你已经置底线于不顾

translation.en: Force me to do the same and I assure you you will not survive!
translation.zh: 逼得我也要这么做你会不得好死的！

translation.en: You threaten my son again, I'll fucking kill you!
translation.zh: 你要再敢威胁我儿子我一定会杀了你！

translation.en: Get the fuck out of here!
translation.zh: 赶紧滚！

translation.en: Tear this place apart! Tear it apart!
translation.zh: 我会把这个地方拆掉！把这个地方拆掉！

translation.en: -You okay? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: Has nothing to do with you, son.
translation.zh: 跟你没关系 儿子

translation.en: I knew he was off the minute I met him.
translation.zh: 我第一次见他时就知道他不正常

translation.en: [Ryuk] You know what happens when they find it.
translation.zh: 如果他们查清真相你知道会有什么后果

translation.en: It ends up my book again, Light.

translation.zh: 每位受害者都在过去48小时被媒体暴露过身份

translation.en: I couldn't! Death can be handed out through a fucking calculus book!
translation.zh: 我阻止不了！一本微积分学笔记就能决定人的生死！

translation.zh: 有没有在莱特特纳家里发现一本微积分的书？

translation.en: Don't take off!

translation.zh: 刚开始我想不明白保险箱里的报纸怎么会不见 （《撞死警察妻子脱罪惯犯又添新罪》）

translation.en: [Light] Dr. Norman Ludlam,

translation.en: known for sexually assaulting female patients under sedation.
translation.zh: 性侵镇静状态的女患者

translation.en: On the night of October 12th, Norman Ludlam is present at the pier
translation.zh: 10月12日晚诺曼卢得兰姆出现在码头

translation.en: when two individuals fall from the Northwest Ferris Wheel.
translation.zh: 有两人从西北摩天轮上坠落

translation.en: He rescues the male suspect from the water
translation.zh: 他从水中救出男性嫌疑人

translation.en: and manages to revive him, saving his life.
translation.zh: 救回了他的命

translation.en: Using his connections at the hospital,
translation.zh: 利用在医院的关系 （苯巴比妥）

translation.en: Ludlam keeps the suspect in a medically-induced coma for two days.
translation.zh: 卢得兰姆向男性嫌疑人注射药物使其昏迷两日

translation.en: At the end of this period, he leaps to his death from the roof of the hospital.
translation.zh: 一切结束后 他从医院楼顶跳楼身亡

translation.en: Aaron Peltz. Mailman, retired.
translation.zh: 亚伦佩尔茨 已退休邮递员

translation.en: Molested nearly a dozen children over the span of 20 years.
translation.zh: 20年间猥亵过十几名儿童

translation.en: Peltz retrieves the Death Note from the river on October 12th.
translation.zh: 佩尔茨于10月12日在河边找到《死亡笔记》

translation.en: Each night, Peltz fills in the blanks with the name of criminals
translation.zh: 每晚佩尔茨都会在笔记本的空白处写下新闻里出现的

translation.en: who appear on the news.

translation.en: On day two, he returns the Death Note to the Kira suspect,
translation.zh: 第二天 他把笔记本还给基拉嫌疑人

translation.en: and then commits suicide.
translation.zh: 然后自杀

translation.en: ♪ When the world outside's Too much to take ♪
translation.zh: （《微积分学》）

translation.en: Mia Sutton is killed when she accepts the Death Note from her boyfriend.
translation.zh: 米娅萨顿在接过她男朋友的《死亡笔记》后死亡

translation.en: As the Northwest Ferris Wheel mysteriously collapses...

translation.en: she pulls the page with my name on it from the note.
translation.zh: 她从笔记本上扯下了写有我名字的那页

translation.en: And it is ultimately consumed by fire.
translation.zh: 这一页最终化作灰烬

translation.en: Although her boyfriend lands safely in the water...

translation.en: Mia strikes the shoreline...
translation.zh: 米娅摔在了海岸上

translation.en: dying instantly.
translation.zh: 当场死亡

translation.en: I made a lot of mistakes.
translation.zh: 我犯了很多错误

translation.en: And then I tried to fix them, but it didn't work.
translation.zh: 然后试图去纠正这些错误但没有成功

translation.en: I thought it was simple at first: I was just gonna kill all the bad guys
translation.zh: 我刚开始的想法很简单：杀死所有坏人

translation.en: and the good guys would win, but it wasn't like that.
